name: steroid
description: A CLI to scaffold your favourite Javascript Framework with build tools, templates, styling and linting configurations ready to go

scripts.link-cli: (yarn unlink --global steroid || true) && chmod +x dist/index.js && yarn link --global
scripts.sudo-link-cli: (sudo yarn unlink --global steroid || true) && chmod +x dist/index.js && sudo yarn link --global

author: Steve Kibuika
